response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the stove. The next step is to turn on the stove.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the stove.
(2) Turn on the stove.
(3) Put the tray with the bacon on the stove.
(4) Cook the bacon on the stove.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    stove = registry(env,"stove_rgpphy_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
